Room.Name: Pier Lithium Imports
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered a large shop previously owned by four adventurers: Rubin, Keyeteh, Maniac and Arjuna. Contact a DM to purchase this establishment.
Room.LongDescription: The store overlooks the Lithium Bay, where ships, carrying a variety of goods from far away lands, dock daily to trade with the Oceancrest merchants. A great variety of goods and services may be purchased here. You must contact the Dungeonmasters if you wish to do business.
